definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: This concept is one of the fundamental doctrines in Buddhism and Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 这一概念是佛教和印度教最基本的教义之一。

sentences.english: The best, most ideal situation is that we absorb Bible doctrine, and learn the principles of Biblical apologetics, during our secondary school years.
sentences.chinese: 我们在中学时期就充分吸收《圣经》教义和护教学。

sentences.english: Catholics are agnostic to the Protestant creeds.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒对于新教教义来说，是不可知论者。

sentences.english: In the context of Buddhist teachings and practice, these are all compassionate actions.
sentences.chinese: 从佛学教义来看，以上皆为慈悲行径。

sentences.english: Those who grasped his message could become as divine as Christ himself.
sentences.chinese: 那些领会了他的教义的人会成为与基督一样的神。

sentences.english: The Christian doctrine of creation finds its expression within the Church.
sentences.chinese: 而基督教的创世论教义是在教会内得到阐明的。

sentences.english: The Egyptian poor are deeply imbued with teachings of Islam.
sentences.chinese: 埃及贫民深受伊斯兰教教义的影响。

sentences.english: Your intellect is a better instrument of spiritual growth than any religious teachings.
sentences.chinese: 你的聪明才智是比宗教教义更好的心灵修炼工具。

sentences.english: This ancient Islamic religious text has sold over 800 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 这本古老的伊斯兰教教义典籍已售出8亿本。

sentences.english: David Terrell continues to teach false doctrines.
sentences.chinese: 大卫特勒尔继续教虚假的教义。

sentences.english: TheChristian dogma oftheresurrection of the body shows considerable profundity on this point.
sentences.chinese: 基督的肉体复活教义在这点上显示了相当的深刻性。

sentences.english: He inculcates religious doctrines in the form of stories.
sentences.chinese: 他灌输宗教教义的形式，故事。

sentences.english: A doctrinal or disciplinary act of an ecumenical council.
sentences.chinese: 教令全基督教会议的教义或纪律法令。

sentences.english: Plato very early on played a part in development of Christian doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 柏拉图很早就在基督教教义的发展历程中起作用了。

sentences.english: This is the biblical model and would fall under the doctrine of concurrence .
sentences.chinese: 这是圣经的模式，也是落在协同运作的教义范畴内的。

sentences.english: What is his doctrine of Christ?
sentences.chinese: 他关于基督的教义是什么？
